attributes.action: Show parliament a video of the effects of the bombing campaign, seek alternates.
attributes.additional_details: From schools, hospitals and homes being blowen up no matter who dropped the bombs we cannot say we are help I g a country if all that is left is blood and ash to rebuild on.
attributes.background: As part of a group backing Corbyn, it also backs stopping the war in favore of more direct peacefull approaches, some of the content that the media dose not show is exstreamly graphic and horrifying but I feel this needs to be seen by the people who allowed it to happen.
